name: Plundering Boy
description:
Plundering Boy is a wacky and humour filled arcade game where you need to plunder the riches of a freshly captured ship. What stays in your way is a heaving ship, huge waves, pesky seagulls, unsecured cargo and your unsteady hands.

Help your crew to plunder that booty, dodge crates and run away from seagulls. Hopefully, the Captain will be pleased...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The game was created during Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam with a theme Unstable

Creators:

programming, blueprints, audio, tutorial, UI, design
